page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ISLA
page.content: IN THE MORNING I WAKE UP AT HALF PAST SEVEN. I WASH, PUT ON MY CLOTHES AND THEN HAVE BREAKFAST. AFTER THAT I BRUSH MY HAIR AND CLEAN MY TEETH.I THEN PUT MY "PLAY PIECE"IN MY SCHOOL BAG AND MAKE SURE THAT I HAVE EVERYTHING THAT I NEED FOR SCHOOL. AFTER THAT I TAKE MY DOG FOR A LONG WALK. WHEN I RETURN I SAY "GOODBYE" TO MY MUM AND GO TO SCHOOL. SCHOOL BEGINS AT NINE O'CLOCK. I DO MENTAL ARITHMETIC AND THEN MATHS UNTIL "PLAY TIME". AT PLAY TIME I EAT MY "PLAY PIECE". I THEN DO SPELLING AND LANGUAGE CENTRE UNTIL DINNER TIME. I HAVE MY DINNER IN THE SCHOOL DINING ROOM AND THEN GO OUT TO PLAY UNTIL ONE TWENTY-FIVE. IN THE AFTERNOON WE DO PROJECTS OR ART OR SOME OTHER WORK. WHEN I GO HOME AT THREE THIRTY I PLAY ON MY BIKE.
